author: jt.aussiegingersnap
title: No-Code NFT Generator [Revelar]
description: El proceso de creación de NFT generativos es complejo y difícil para los artistas que quieren crear NFT para juegos sin un desarrollador caro.

f6_assessments.q0: the roadmap is sensibly structured and the delivery dates clearly defined. the community could check the progress of the project via its own website, provided that the applicant sends regular updates. unfortunately, there is no info on this. possible risks are not described and should be mentioned. also possible solutions for them.
f6_assessments.q1: budget and schedule are structured in great detail. the company is announced and a link to the website is also provided. the experience of the team is matched to the project. the team is introduced with links to the liked.in profiles.
f6_assessments.q2: the roadmap is sensibly structured and the delivery dates clearly defined. the community could check the progress of the project via its own website, provided that the applicant sends regular updates. unfortunately, there is no info on this. possible risks are not described and should be mentioned. also possible solutions for them.

f6_assessments.q0: The team in this proposal clearly points out the problem with NFTs and offers a great solution. This project, when implemented, will have a positive impact on the Cardano ecosystem. The proposal explains how the project will add value to the Cardano ecosystem. The team elaborates and lists in the proposal KPIs which match the ones indicated in the challenge and the proposal is able to scale and address future challenges.
f6_assessments.q1: For some reason, the website that the team set up in the proposal does not work, but links via LinkedIn that clearly give us insight into the members and number of the team clearly let us know that the team has the necessary skills, experience and knowledge needed to implement this project. The budget is reasonable and clearly shown, broken down into identifiable items and with that budget the project will be able to be realized. The team has developed a detailed implementable plan and details of actionable tasks and order of execution are clearly presented with real time within the work will be completed. In the proposal they didn't list the resources needed to carry out this project but we have a presentation of the technical aspects needed to implement the whole idea. It would be good to have an idea of the possible risks and how to overcome those risks.
f6_assessments.q2: The roadmap with milestones and a time horizon for achievement is well presented in this proposal and KPIs make sense and can be used to quantify the success of the project. The community can track the development of this project.

f6_assessments.q0: This project looks like it could be a useful addition to the tools available to game developers.  Allowing people with less technical expertise to easily create generative NFTs without having to hire others to do labor for them would likely encourage more growth and development for this aspect of Cardano.
f6_assessments.q1: Given the varied skills and expertise of the dev team, as well as the clear intent and specific goals of this project including funding breakdowns and well-defined concepts, success is a likely outcome.
f6_assessments.q2: Developer has provided specific, trackable objectives that will be met within specific time frame, up to launch.  This and other metrics the developer intends to record should make auditing easy.

f6_assessments.q0:
This is a pretty good proposition. It Create an easy web app for any artist to upload their art layers, choose rarity algorithms & export all final assets ready to mint as NFT's.
This proposal covers the entire website for artists to use the Revelar API in a no-code drag and drop experience to create all final assets out of their art layers. Pick from statistical / random rarity generation algorithms to automatically combine your art assets into final files ready to mint.
f6_assessments.q1: The plan is presented in a truly optimal way, there is a good chance that this proposal can be successfully implemented in the manner described by the proponents. The roadmap is well estimated in my opinion, the terms seem concrete, the team is well trained and multidisciplinary in the gaming area. The budget is clear and reasonable to achieve the objectives set, however it is not divided by areas (eg DevOps, Development, Design, Marketing, ..), doing this would certainly help to better outline the costs, perhaps even dividing them by phases.
f6_assessments.q2:
Everything is concise and to the point. The need is clear, implementation is already promising. There's enough information about the team and metrics which would help the effective tracking of their progress by the Project Catalyst community. However, I think it is necessary to add a description of Revelar's features (e.g. how to create a project, how the user can manipulate it,...)
The image of the interface provided is very attractive, the interface is quite simple. However, I cannot access the website that was provided. (The time of my access is 12/12/2021).
In short, this is a very potential project, I hope it will be implemented successfully.

solution: Crear una aplicación web sencilla para que cualquier artista cargue sus capas de arte, elija los algoritmos de rareza y exporte todos los activos finales listos para acuñar como NFT.
experience: Una década como fundador y director de tecnología + Pionero de Plutus + Fondo 6 + junto a un equipo completo de ingenieros. (Ver abajo)
